description: Retrieve conversations with flexible filtering (consolidates getConvos + getExpectedConversations + listChatRequests + getRequestCount)

main.description: Query conversations for the authenticated user with pagination and filtering. The 'filter' parameter replaces separate endpoints for expected conversations, chat requests, and request counts.

limit.description: Maximum number of conversations to return

filter.description: Filter conversations: 'all' (default, active conversations), 'pending' (incoming chat requests awaiting acceptance), 'expected' (conversations user is expected to join via Welcome/ExternalCommit)

countOnly.description: If true, only return counts without conversation data. Useful for badge counts.

conversations.description: List of conversations (empty if countOnly is true)

pendingCount.description: Number of pending chat requests (always included for badge display)

requestCount.description: Total number of unresolved chat requests

errors.name: InvalidCursor
errors.description: The provided pagination cursor is invalid
